dataSet.name: DataSet1

calculatedField.presentationExpression: CASE WHEN ANSWER = 1 THEN "ДА" WHEN Answer = 0 THEN "НЕТ" END
CASE WHEN Sum(BaseUnitQty) >= 1 THEN "ДА" WHEN Sum(BaseUnitQty) = 0 THEN "НЕТ" END

calculatedField.expression: Case when sum(PlanFactQty) = 0 then 0 else sum(PlanFactQty) / sum(BaseUnitQty) * 100 end
Case when BaseUnitQty = 0 Then Null Else Answer End
avg(Case when PlanFactQty = 0 then 0 else PlanFactQty / BaseUnitQty * 100 end)
